basics.name: Luis J. Aguirre-Lopez
basics.label: Ecologist
basics.summary: Ecologist interested in the dynamics of biotic interactions and their consequences for the structure and function of ecological communities. I use a combination of field observations, experiments, and mathematical models to understand the mechanisms that generate and maintain biodiversity.

work.name: Department of Biology, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
work.summary: Research and Teaching Assistant working with Dr. Xiao Feng.
